_comment_tile_config: Tiles to use in the race (1-5) in order. Each tile has 20 fields. Available tiles: 1=Flat, 2=Mountaintop Finish, 3=Champs Elysees, 4=Up and Down, 5=Paris-Roubaix
_comment_starting_hand: Configure the starting hand for each player. Total should not exceed 90 (total deck size). Default: 9 cards per player

starting_hand._comment_energy: Number of Energy cards in starting hand (Energy cards always move 1 field)
starting_hand._comment_rouleur: Number of Rouleur cards in starting hand
starting_hand._comment_sprinter: Number of Sprinter cards in starting hand
starting_hand._comment_climber: Number of Climber cards in starting hand
starting_hand._comment_random: Number of random cards drawn from remaining deck for starting hand

_comment_checkpoints: Configure card drawing at checkpoints (every 10 fields: 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60...)

checkpoints._comment_10: Cards drawn at field 10 of each tile (and 30, 50, etc.)
checkpoints._comment_20: Cards drawn at field 20 of each tile (last field of tile 1, also 60, 100, etc.)
checkpoints._comment_40: Cards drawn at field 40 of each tile (last field of tile 2, also 80, 120, etc.)
